item.description:
Are you a guy? Do you like thousands of fit women? Then this is the opportunity you've been waiting for. Columbus Day and the Tufts 10K for Women is approaching fast!

TMIRCE has "Manned" the final water stop for the past two years while donning Tuxedos and fine Italian Suits. Many Kisses ensued.

The Details You Need to Know


Volunteers need to check in by 9:00am at the corner of Beacon and Charles (the public garden side)


PLEASE SEE THE MAP FOR FURTHER DETAILS:
http://tinyurl.com/3a...

After you check in, it is a short walk up to the corner of Commonwealth Ave. and Dartmouth St.

Some feedback from the race:

"The women love you guys! They always ask if those Tuxedoed Men will be handing out water again." Tufts 10k volunteer coordinator
"I ran the first 5 miles just to see the guys in Tux's." Tufts 10k finisher

Please RSVP here. We are looking for 12-15 volunteers for Monday October 11th.

Details to follow.

Andy

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Calling all Guys. Tufts 10K for Women! VOLUNTEER 4 TMIRCE
